articles.title: A Soyuz capsule with 2 Russians and 1 American returns to Earth from the International Space Station - ABC News
articles.description: A Soyuz capsule carrying two Russian cosmonauts and one American astronaut safely landed Sunday in Kazakhstan, concluding a 220-day mission aboard the International Space Station
articles.content:
MOSCOW -- A Soyuz capsule carrying two Russians and one American from the International Space Station landed Sunday in Kazakhstan, ending their seven-month research assignment.
